fields.name: Ro Sham Bo (passive):
fields.value:
Rock: Anyone who targets you with an attack will be roleblocked.
Paper: Anyone who targets you with an investigative ability will get a random result.
Scissors: Anyone who targets you with a protective ability will have the action also applied to themselves.

fields.name: Let's Play!(1x):
fields.value: This night you can challenge any number of players to a game of rock, paper, scissors. Loser is dealt an advanced attack. You cannot target the same person twice. Winning a match with a throw will count for activating that portion of your passive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Activate all 3 parts of your passive at least once.
